meanings.definition: A person who boasts or brags excessively.
meanings.sent1: The vaunters in the group always talked about their accomplishments.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the vaunters who constantly bragged about themselves.
meanings.sent3: The vaunters at the party made everyone roll their eyes with their non-stop bragging.
meanings.sent4: The vaunters were like peacocks, showing off their feathers to anyone who would listen.
meanings.sent5: The vaunters stood out in the crowd with their loud boasting.

meanings.definition: To boast or brag about one's own achievements or possessions.
meanings.sent1: He vaunters about his new car to anyone who will listen.
meanings.sent2: She always vaunters about her accomplishments at work.
meanings.sent3: The little boy vaunters to his friends about his video game skills.
meanings.sent4: She vaunters like a peacock displaying its feathers.
meanings.sent5: He vaunters so much that no one believes his stories anymore.
